summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 112, A.A. Denny's Broadway Addition, from University Street to Union Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8194 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
